languages.text: "Вольный Торговец!" {n}Глаза Ардженты горят испепеляющим пламенем оскорбленной веры.{/n} "Скверна и ересь проникли на борт этого пустотного корабля и, словно насмехаясь над праведными, воцарились на мостике! Ты тешишь себя мыслью о том, что это чудовище Архиврага покорно тебе, но подобными мыслями лишь позволяет тьме проникнуть в самую душу, отравляя ее. Твой поступок не ведает ни объяснения, ни прощения — знай об этом!"

"Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец!" {n}Глаза Ардженты горят испепеляющим пламенем оскорбленной веры.{/n} "Скверна и ересь проникли на борт этого пустотного корабля и, словно насмехаясь над праведными, воцарились на мостике! Твой поступок не ведает ни объяснения, ни прощения — знай об этом!"

You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. languages.text: «¡Comerciante Independiente!». {n}La mirada de Argenta arde con las llamas abrasadoras de su fe ultrajada.{/n} «¡La impureza y la herejía han subido a bordo de esta nave y ocupan el puente de mando como una burla a todo lo que es virtuoso y pío! Se engaña a sí {mf|mismo|misma} si cree tener bajo control a ese monstruo del Archienemigo, pero con esa actitud se expone a que las tinieblas penetren en su alma y la envenenen. ¡Sepa que tal fechoría no merece excusa ni perdón alguno!».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Comerciante Independiente!». {n}La mirada de Argenta arde con las llamas abrasadoras de su fe ultrajada.{/n} «¡La impureza y la herejía han subido a bordo de esta nave y ocupan el puente de mando como una burla a todo lo que es virtuoso y pío! Se engaña a sí {mf|mismo|misma} si cree tener bajo control a ese monstruo del Archienemigo, pero con esa actitud se expone a que las tinieblas penetren en su alma y la envenenen. ¡Sepa que tal fechoría no merece excusa ni perdón alguno!».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ！」{n}アルジェンタの目は、侮辱された信仰の焼けるような炎で燃えている。{/n}「腐敗と異端がこのヴォイドシップに侵入し、正義をあざ笑うかのようにブリッジを占拠してしまった！ あなたは渾沌の勢力の怪物を制圧していると錯覚しているようだが、そのような考えは闇を自分の魂に浸透させ、毒させてしまうだけだ。どのような説明をもってしても、あなたの行いは許されない！」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ！」{n}アルジェンタの目は、侮辱された信仰の焼けるような炎で燃えている。{/n}「腐敗と異端がこのヴォイドシップに侵入し、正義をあざ笑うかのようにブリッジを占拠してしまった！ あなたは渾沌の勢力の怪物を制圧していると錯覚しているようだが、そのような考えは闇を自分の魂に浸透させ、毒させてしまうだけだ。どのような説明をもってしても、あなたの行いは許されない！」

languages.text: “行商浪人！”{n}阿洁塔的信仰遭到了挑战，她的双眼此刻燃烧着怒火。{/n}“污秽与异端已经渗透到了这艘虚空舰中，此刻正在舰桥上肆虐，仿佛在超弄着正义！你自欺欺人地认为，这头混沌大敌的怪物处于你的控制之下，但这样的想法只会让你的灵魂被黑暗渗透、毒害。你要知道，你的行为已不容辩解，也不容宽恕！”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人！”{n}阿洁塔的信仰遭到了挑战，她的双眼此刻燃烧着怒火。{/n}“污秽与异端已经渗透到了这艘虚空舰中，此刻正在舰桥上肆虐，仿佛在超弄着正义！你自欺欺人地认为，这头混沌大敌的怪物处于你的控制之下，但这样的想法只会让你的灵魂被黑暗渗透、毒害。你要知道，你的行为已不容辩解，也不容宽恕！”

languages.text: {n}Les flammes dévorantes d'une foi outragée brûlent dans les yeux d'Argenta.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! La vermine et l'hérésie sont montées à bord de ce vaisseau et règnent à présent sur la passerelle, comme pour moquer les vertueux ! Vous imaginez contrôler ce monstre du Grand Ennemi, mais de telles pensées ne servent qu'à ouvrir les portes de votre âme au poison des ténèbres. Sachez que vos agissements n'appellent ni excuses ni pardon ! »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les flammes dévorantes d'une foi outragée brûlent dans les yeux d'Argenta.{/n} « {mfLlibre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! La vermine et l'hérésie sont montées à bord de ce vaisseau et règnent à présent sur la passerelle, comme pour moquer les vertueux ! Vous imaginez contrôler ce monstre du Grand Ennemi, mais de telles pensées ne servent qu'à ouvrir les portes de votre âme au poison des ténèbres. Sachez que vos agissements n'appellent ni excuses ni pardon ! »

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!" {n}In Argentas Augen brennen die einäschernden Flammen beleidigten Glaubens.{/n} "Schmutz und Ketzerei sind an Bord dieses Raumschiffs gekommen und herrschen nun über die Brücke, wie um die Rechtschaffenen zu verspotten! Ihr redet Euch ein, dass Ihr dieses Monster des Erzfeinds unter Kontrolle habt. Doch solche Gedanken dienen nur dazu, die Dunkelheit Eure Seele durchdringen zu lassen. Sie vergiften zu lassen. Eure Tat kann nicht erklärt und nicht verziehen werden — wisset das!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}!" {n}In Argentas Augen brennen die einäschernden Flammen beleidigten Glaubens.{/n} "Schmutz und Ketzerei sind an Bord dieses Raumschiffs gekommen und herrschen nun über die Brücke, wie um die Rechtschaffenen zu verspotten! Ihr redet Euch ein, dass Ihr dieses Monster des Erzfeinds unter Kontrolle habt. Doch solche Gedanken dienen nur dazu, die Dunkelheit Eure Seele durchdringen zu lassen. Sie vergiften zu lassen. Eure Tat kann nicht erklärt und nicht verziehen werden — wisset das!"

languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir!" {n}Argenta'nın kor gibi yanan gözleri, inancına edilen hakareti yansıtıyor.{/n} "Bu uçsuz gemisine fesatlık ve kâfirlik ayak basmış, hatta haklılarla alay eder gibi köprüde hâkimiyet kurmuş! Şerbaşı'nın canavarına hükmedebileceğini sanıyorsun ama bu düşüncelerin anca karanlığın ruhuna nüfuz edip onu zehirlemesine yol açar. Bu yaptığının ne açıklaması ne de affı olur, bilesin!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader!" {n}Argenta's eyes burn with the incinerating flames of affronted faith.{/n} "Filth and heresy have come aboard this voidship and, as if in mockery of the righteous, now reign over the bridge! You delude yourself that this monster of the Archenemy is under your control, but such thoughts only serve to let darkness penetrate your very soul, poisoning it. Your deed brooks no explanation or forgiveness — know this!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir!" {n}Argenta'nın kor gibi yanan gözleri, inancına edilen hakareti yansıtıyor.{/n} "Bu uçsuz gemisine fesatlık ve kâfirlik ayak basmış, hatta haklılarla alay eder gibi köprüde hâkimiyet kurmuştur! Şerbaşı'nın canavarına hükmedebileceğini sanıyorsun ama bu düşüncelerin, ancak karanlığın ruhuna nüfuz edip onu zehirlemesine yol açar. Bu yaptığının ne açıklaması ne de affı olur, bilesin!"
